mapper.select: select t.id, t.p_id,t.name as title, t.icon, t.hide, (case when (select count(1) from sys_permissions where p_id = t.id) > 0 then 'false' else 'true' end ) as isLeaf from sys_permissions t where t.p_id = #{pId} order by t.order_no

select t.id,t.code,t.name,t.icon,t.path,t.hide,t.target,t.component,t.component,t.type,t.status,t.tips,t.p_id,p.name as pName from sys_permissions t left join sys_permissions p on p.id = t.p_id where t.id= #{id}

select t.id,t.name,t.order_no from sys_permissions t where t.p_id = #{pId} order by t.order_no
limit #{str},#{length}
select t.id, t.p_id,t.icon, t.hide,t.name as title from sys_permissions t where t.name like #{title} order by t.p_id,t.order_no
select t.id,t.icon, t.hide,t.name as title,t.p_id from sys_permissions t where t.status = #{status} order by t.order_no
